attributes.action: Stop giving infant rapist Ian Watkins easy prison time
attributes.additional_details: I have just discovered that evil paedophile, and would be child killer Ian Watkins was secretly moved again to Rye Hill prison months ago for an easier ride. It is now a sex offender only prison. Let's stop giving this evil infant rapist who wanted yo torture and kill children, and evil prisoners like him special treatment can we.  He needs to be out of his comfort zone, swapping sick stories with other paedophiles and in a real prison.
